         "// Imports\nimport ___CSS_LOADER_API_SOURCEMAP_IMPORT___ from \"../node_modules/css-loader/dist/runtime/cssWithMappingToString.js\";\nimport ___CSS_LOADER_API_IMPORT___ from \"../node_modules/css-loader/dist/runtime/api.js\";\nvar ___CSS_LOADER_EXPORT___ = ___CSS_LOADER_API_IMPORT___(___CSS_LOADER_API_SOURCEMAP_IMPORT___);\n// Module\n___CSS_LOADER_EXPORT___.push([module.id, \"/*\\n * Copyright (c) 2023 ipyforcegraph contributors.\\n * Distributed under the terms of the Modified BSD License.\\n*/\\n.jp-ForceGraph {\\n  display: flex;\\n  flex-direction: column;\\n  width: 100%;\\n}\\n\\n.jp-ForceGraph iframe {\\n  flex: 1;\\n  border: solid 1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);\\n  overflow: hidden;\\n  transition: border-color 0.5s;\\n}\\n\\n.jp-ForceGraph iframe:hover {\\n  border-color: var(--jp-border-color2);\\n  transition: border-color 0.5s;\\n}\\n\\n/*\\nWhen drag events occur, `lm-mod-override-cursor` is added to the body.\\nBecause iframes steal all cursor events, the following two rules are necessary\\nto suppress pointer events while resize drags are occurring. There may be a\\nbetter solution to this problem.\\n*/\\nbody.lm-mod-override-cursor .jp-ForceGraph {\\n  position: relative;\\n}\\n\\nbody.lm-mod-override-cursor .jp-ForceGraph::before {\\n  content: '';\\n  position: absolute;\\n  top: 0;\\n  left: 0;\\n  right: 0;\\n  bottom: 0;\\n  background: transparent;\\n}\\n\", \"\",{\"version\":3,\"sources\":[\"webpack://./style/index.css\"],\"names\":[],\"mappings\":\"AAAA;;;CAGC;AACD;EACE,aAAa;EACb,sBAAsB;EACtB,WAAW;AACb;;AAEA;EACE,OAAO;EACP,kCAAkC;EAClC,gBAAgB;EAChB,6BAA6B;AAC/B;;AAEA;EACE,qCAAqC;EACrC,6BAA6B;AAC/B;;AAEA;;;;;CAKC;AACD;EACE,kBAAkB;AACpB;;AAEA;EACE,WAAW;EACX,kBAAkB;EAClB,MAAM;EACN,OAAO;EACP,QAAQ;EACR,SAAS;EACT,uBAAuB;AACzB\",\"sourcesContent\":[\"/*\\n * Copyright (c) 2023 ipyforcegraph contributors.\\n * Distributed under the terms of the Modified BSD License.\\n*/\\n.jp-ForceGraph {\\n  display: flex;\\n  flex-direction: column;\\n  width: 100%;\\n}\\n\\n.jp-ForceGraph iframe {\\n  flex: 1;\\n  border: solid 1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);\\n  overflow: hidden;\\n  transition: border-color 0.5s;\\n}\\n\\n.jp-ForceGraph iframe:hover {\\n  border-color: var(--jp-border-color2);\\n  transition: border-color 0.5s;\\n}\\n\\n/*\\nWhen drag events occur, `lm-mod-override-cursor` is added to the body.\\nBecause iframes steal all cursor events, the following two rules are necessary\\nto suppress pointer events while resize drags are occurring. There may be a\\nbetter solution to this problem.\\n*/\\nbody.lm-mod-override-cursor .jp-ForceGraph {\\n  position: relative;\\n}\\n\\nbody.lm-mod-override-cursor .jp-ForceGraph::before {\\n  content: '';\\n  position: absolute;\\n  top: 0;\\n  left: 0;\\n  right: 0;\\n  bottom: 0;\\n  background: transparent;\\n}\\n\"],\"sourceRoot\":\"\"}]);\n// Exports\nexport default ___CSS_LOADER_EXPORT___;\n",
         "/*\n * Copyright (c) 2023 ipyforcegraph contributors.\n * Distributed under the terms of the Modified BSD License.\n */\nimport { Application, IPlugin } from '@lumino/application';\nimport { PromiseDelegate } from '@lumino/coreutils';\nimport { Widget } from '@lumino/widgets';\n\nimport { IJupyterWidgetRegistry } from '@jupyter-widgets/base';\n\nimport '../style/index.css';\n\nimport { DEBUG, EMOJI, NAME, VERSION } from './tokens';\nimport type * as WidgetExports from './widgets';\n\nconst EXTENSION_ID = `${NAME}:plugin`;\n\nconst plugin: IPlugin<Application<Widget>, void> = {\n  id: EXTENSION_ID,\n  requires: [IJupyterWidgetRegistry],\n  autoStart: true,\n  activate: (app: Application<Widget>, registry: IJupyterWidgetRegistry) => {\n    DEBUG && console.warn(`${EMOJI} ${NAME}@${VERSION} loaded`);\n\n    let widgetExports: typeof WidgetExports | null = null;\n    let loadingWidgets: PromiseDelegate<void> | null = null;\n\n    registry.registerWidget({\n      name: NAME,\n      version: VERSION,\n      exports: async () => {\n        if (widgetExports) {\n          return widgetExports;\n        } else if (loadingWidgets) {\n          await loadingWidgets.promise;\n          return widgetExports;\n        }\n\n        loadingWidgets = new PromiseDelegate();\n        const { initializeZstd } = await import('./widgets/serializers/dataframe');\n        await initializeZstd();\n\n        DEBUG && console.warn(`${EMOJI} loading widgets`);\n        widgetExports = {\n          ...(await import('./widgets')),\n        };\n        loadingWidgets.resolve(void 0);\n        DEBUG && console.warn(`${EMOJI} widgets loaded`, widgetExports);\n        return widgetExports;\n      },\n    });\n  },\n};\n\nexport default [plugin];\n",
